pullrequest.title: Adding cppcheck and cpplint with codecheck target

content.raw:
I fixed the problem here: 063840e 

The fix is bordering on hacky. A c++ source file is created in the project's build folder that is guaranteed to pass codecheck. This file is used to make sure that there is always at least one file for cppcheck and cpplint. Alternatively, I could glob for files over all the CPPCHECK_DIRS, and make a dummy `codecheck` target if no files are found. This current approach was easier, but I'm willing to change it.

I also had to add copyright header to `empty.cc` to satisfy codecheck.
